full_description:
Insta360 X4 Waterproof 8K 360 Action Camera

The Insta360 X4 Waterproof 360 Action Camera is a premium gadget with amazing 360-degree photography and video recording capabilities. This action camera can create clear and vivid photos. It has a 1/2'' sensor's F1.9 aperture and 6.7mm equivalent focal length which helps to create a good snap. In addition to 4K in single-lens mode, the action camera can record in 8K at 30 frames per second and 5.7K at up to 60 frames per second in 360º mode. Insta360 X4 Waterproof 360 Action Camera can also take beautiful pictures with resolutions of roughly 72MP and 18MP. the camera has multiple video and photo modes. The modes include Active HDR, Timelapse, Bullet Time, and Starlapse. The Insta360 X4 is versatile enough for a variety of shooting situations. It comes with four microphones and also settings like Auto Wind Reduction that help to record with great audio quality. It has a Direction Focus that helps you to have a better picture. The action camera has a very sturdy structure. It has a 10-meter waterproof rating and this camera may be used for a variety of outdoor activities. With a 2290mAh battery that can record for up to 135 minutes at 5.7K30 frames per second. The action camera has a good battery life. A Type-C USB 3.0 connector allows for quick charging. Dual-band Wi-Fi (2.4GHz and 5GHz) and BLE 5.2 Bluetooth connectivity options ensure simple pairing with compatible devices, such as more recent iPhone and Android models. The dimensions of the Insta360 X4 are 46x123.6x37.6mm and it weighs only 203g making it lightweight and portable. The action camera accepts UHS-I V30 speed class SD cards up to 1TB. The camera is designed to endure extreme weather. It has undergone stability and durability testing. Besides, it performs well in temperatures between -4°F and 104°F. All things considered, the Insta360 X4 is an action camera that is strong, adaptable, and long-lasting which is ideal for producing engaging, excellent 360-degree video.

Great Image Quality with a Great Frame Rate

The Insta360 X4 action camera has incredible 8K 360° capabilities and an awesome 5nm AI chip which has created a milestone among action cameras. This comes with breathtaking clarity and detail which allows users to relive their memories with unparalleled precision. The camera supports high frame rates, including 5.7K at 60fps, making it ideal for action scenes and smooth cinematic slow motion in 4K at 100fps.

AI-Powered Selfie Stick

The Insta360 X4 action camera has a standout feature of reframing capability. This allows users to select the best angles after recording using AI-powered tools in the Insta360 app. The Invisible Selfie Stick vanishes from the footage which results in impossible third-person and drone shots. The 360° Active HDR mode of this action camera improves detail and stability, which is especially useful for action sports. With 72MP 360° photos, users can capture immersive images with exceptional clarity in an Insta360 X4 action camera.

8K 360 Degree Capture

The Insta360 X4 action camera captures stunning 8K 360° videos. The action camera brings clarity to a whole new level in your captures. This camera is powered by a magnificent 5nm AI chip. This camera allows you to immerse yourself in a world of incredible detail, making every moment look as vivid as the first time you saw it.

Reframing Ability

Insta360 X4 comes with a lot of features and one of the main benefits of 360º capture is the ability to select optimal angles after recording. The Insta360 app has AI-powered reframing tools that allow you to record and then find the perfect shot later, ensuring you never miss a moment.

Invisible Selfie Stick

The Insta360 X4 comes with The Invisible Selfie Stick feature by which the selfie stick magically disappears from your footage. This feature helps you to capture incredible third-person shots and drone-like angles that would otherwise be impossible with other action cameras.

Insta360 ONE RS 4K Edition Waterproof Action Camera

The Insta360 ONE RS 4K Edition is a modular action camera system with interchangeable lenses. This edition is designed for action sports and includes the ONE RS Core module, the ONE RS Boost 4K lens, the ONE RS battery base, and a ONE RS mounting bracket. The 4K Boost Lens captures 4K60 video, up to 6K widescreen video, and 48MP still photos, and it features a 1/2" image sensor with Active HDR support. full_description:
Insta360 X3 Waterproof 360 Action Camera

Insta360 X3 Waterproof 360 Action Camera comes with an upgraded 1/2" sensor and a larger touchscreen. It is capable of capturing high-definition 360° and single-lens video with one portable action camera. The X3 offers an action-ready design with AI-powered software for an intuitive approach to creating dynamic content in any environment. Its rugged IPX8 design is natively waterproof up to 33' and has a built-in rechargeable 1800mAh battery for increased shooting time.

5.7K 360° Video, 4K Single-Lens Mode

Insta360 X3 is equipped with dual 360° lenses and it can capture up to 5.7K video and 72MP photos with ease. You can switch to single-lens shooting and record 4K video at up to 30 fps. For extremely wide-angle 170° shots, turn on MaxView mode with 2.7K resolution.

AI-Powered Reframing

Insta360 X3 Waterproof 360 Action Camera automatically reframe your shot in 360° while you toggle between different capture modes. "Me" Mode creates the effect of an invisible selfie stick and films video up to 1080p at 30 and 60 fps. The effect creates the equivalent of 5.7K reframing and supports 16:9 and 9:16 aspect ratios. This AI interface eliminates the need to reframe your footage in the post while capturing aerial angles and third-person perspectives, no matter the selfie stick configuration.

Audio Algorithm Updates

The Insta360 X3 can capture stereo audio with reduced wind noise and 360° enhancement. Using four built-in microphones and an upgraded audio algorithm, the X3 records more natural and balanced audio than its predecessor. It also allows you to use Voice Control 2.0 to switch your settings when your camera is mounted out of reach on a selfie stick or head strap.

Ultrasmooth, Stabilized Footage

The Insta360 X3 ensures your footage remains stabilized thanks to its 6-axis gyroscope and FlowState Stabilization technology. 360° active HDR mode is specifically designed for action sports like ziplining and mountain biking by keeping your video stable as you move while maintaining details in the highlights and shadows for more vibrant footage. Horizon lock keeps the horizontal plane of your video consistent and allows the camera to rotate freely while keeping the sky-line level.

Massive Touchscreen

Insta360 X3 Waterproof 360 Action Camera is equipped with a larger 2.29" touchscreen on the back of the camera providing a clear view of your footage as you shoot it. Four operating buttons with vibration feedback toggle between shooting modes for quick control.

IPX8 Waterproof to 33ft

You can take Insta360 X3 Waterproof 360 Action Camera down to 33ft (10m) straight out of the box. Grab the Dive Case for seamless stitching of your underwater 360 footage down to 164ft (50m).

full_description:
Insta360 Ace Pro 8K Waterproof Action Camera

The Insta360 Ace Pro 8K Waterproof Action Camera has a 1/1.3" sensor size and an aperture of F2.6, resulting in superb image quality even in low-light circumstances. Its broad perspective and 35mm equivalent focal length make it perfect for action-packed scenarios. Stunningly detailed film may be produced using the camera's amazing range of video resolutions, which include 8K at 24 frames per second and multiple possibilities up to 4K at high frame rates. With resolutions up to 48MP and support for the DNG RAW format, which offers post-processing flexibility, the photo capabilities are similarly excellent. While color profiles like Standard, Vivid, and Flat accommodate various shooting styles, advanced capabilities like Active HDR, FreeFrame Video, and Slow Motion expand creative possibilities. With a maximum bitrate of 170Mbps, the Insta360 Ace Pro 8K Action Camera facilitates H.265 & H.264 video coding, guaranteeing effective reduction without sacrificing quality. Clear sound is produced in every setting thanks to audio capabilities like direction focus, stereo, and wind suppression. It is appropriate for underwater activities with a waterproof depth of up to 33 feet (10 meters) without a dive case and up to 197 feet (60 meters) with one. Connectivity options for the Insta360 Ace Pro 8K Waterproof Action Camera include USB Type-C, Bluetooth 5.2, and Wi-Fi with compatibility for both 2.4GHz and 5GHz bands. Smooth video stabilization is ensured with a 6-axis gyroscope, and up to 100 minutes of continuous recording are possible with a 1650mAh battery.

Flagship 1/1.3'' Sensor

With its larger sensor that enables up to 2.4μm pixel size, the Insta360 Ace Pro 8K Action Camera collects more light and gives next-level dynamic range and image quality even in low light or situations with fast-moving action. Leica adds its renowned proficiency in optical design and cutting-edge imagery to the action camera, working exclusively with Insta360. This premium partnership offers breathtaking images at any time.

2.4'' Flip Touchscreen

With its large flip touchscreen, the Insta360 Ace Pro Action Camera offers greater control. It's simpler to utilize and preview your photos thanks to the 2.4" flexible touchscreen. While your eyes are focused on the road, quickly glance down to check your shot. Ideal for awkward angles, self-portraits, and vlogging.

Powerful 5nm AI Chip

PureVideo Mode is powered by a sophisticated, specially-trained AI neural network on a potent 5nm AI processor. For astounding quality in low light, the Insta360 Ace Pro Waterproof Action Camera boosts brightness, lowers noise, and expands dynamic range. Discover a simpler method for filming. Give the signal to begin or end a video or to snap a picture. Ideal for noisy settings, group selfies, or situations when you don't want to draw notice to yourself.

Built-In Active HDR

As you move, the Ace Pro action camera stabilizes your film and preserves details in the highlights and shadows for footage with greater vibrancy. As you move, Ace Pro maintains the stability of your video while preserving details in the highlights and shadows for footage with greater vibrancy.

2x Zoom Without Compromising Image Quality

Prepare for a close-up with the Insta360 Ace Pro Action Camera by double tapping the screen to zoom in or out by two times without sacrificing image quality. Clarity Zoom concentrates on the same resolution as other cameras, rather than just cropping the picture.

Voice Control 2.0

With its unique voice control algorithm, the Insta360 Ace Pro 8K Action Camera makes shooting easier even when your hands are full. Give it a command, then watch as it performs its magic.

The Space Saver with AI Assistant

The AI Highlights Assistant on the Insta360 Ace Pro 8K Action Camera helps you save valuable time and SD card space! It selects the top scenes from a single film and plays them back to you in real time! For easy file management, you select what to keep and what to remove. Make use of strong AI that is aware of the action. When you connect to the Insta360 app, a video that is ready to share displays.

Flowstate Stabilization, 360° Horizontal Lock

Thanks to its industry-leading picture stabilization, the Insta360 Ace Pro Action Camera can withstand even the sharpest bumps and vibrations. Videos that flow effortlessly, regardless of the action. Increase the action and maintain the ideal level of your videos with 360° Horizontal Lock. Perfect video every single time.

Fast Charge & Long Battery Life

With an extended battery life, the Insta360 Ace Pro 8K Action Camera operates continuously throughout the day. Even when recording active HDR footage at 4K/30 frames per second, Ace Pro can record the action for up to 100 minutes. The battery can be charged fast; it takes just 22 minutes to reach 80% and 46 minutes to fully charge.

Underwater Adventures

The Instra360 Action Camera is engineered with exploration in mind. Ace Pro's 33 feet (10 meters) of waterproofness is more than sufficient for going on exciting underwater excursions. With the dive case, lower the camera to 196 feet (60 meters).

Engineered for adventure, RUGGED

Have faith that your Insta360 Ace Pro camera can continue to record footage in the most demanding circumstances. dependable winter sports shooting even at -4°F (-20°C) because of its comfort.

Easy Sharing

While the Insta360 app operates silently in the background, you may download footage from the Insta360 Ace Pro action camera and use your phone for other purposes.
